website_summaries.verdict: Durable tetherball with a 2-piece steel pole that will stand up to plenty of games and weather.
pros: Resists rust when exposed to all kinds of weather
Pole measures over 10-feet tall with a 1-foot in-ground pole sleeve that allows for removal
Regulation-size ball is soft but stands up to rough treatment
cons: Rope may fray after several uses

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Makes me so sad that something we were so excited to do with our kids, is a piece of junk! We finally got around to putting it up,and It didn't last more than 10-12 games before looking like this! I would not wast time and money. We put concrete down and it was super flimsy from the beginning as well
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Missing Accessories
customer_reviews.text: My kids were happy I bought a tetherball although they didn't know what that was. My wife was pissed, but hey its for the kids! I ordered it and put it in storage and finally opened the box to see there was only the poles. I could not believe it! All this excitement of putting it together and now I have no accessories. Very disappointed! I wish I would of opened it sooner and check to see if everything was in there.
customer_reviews.author: Morris Family

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play but black sleeve is too thin and the pole is wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: I was reading reviews in this a read one that said the black sleeve busted that it's too thin. Well I just got mine in yesterday and installed it. The black sleeve is too thin and it did bust trying to install the pole into the ground. The pole is pretty wobbly...I am hop andng with some imagination I can figure out how to get the pole to where it's more stable. Other than that me and my kids played with it and we love it. Brings me back to when I was in school and enjoyed that game.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanlea Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Soft strike ball is something I could have only dreamed of back when I was a kid hitting that concrete on a rope at school! You need to concrete this into the ground or a tire or something but consumer concrete is so easy anyone can do it!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After going through old photographs my boys saw an old teather ball in a photo. We have a Labrador dog and figured she would love it. Just need to get a bag of quick cement (so pole stays secure in ground) Lab already loves it and gets 2 teenage boys outside.
customer_reviews.author: JnyGrl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how nice this was. The pole is very sturdy and the rope and ball are very substantial. We installed deep in the ground using minus instead of concrete. When we mow we just lift the pole out of the ground and replace when we are finished. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love this. Comes with everything you need. Sleeve stays in the ground and you can take pole out to mow or store.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Is worth the value
customer_reviews.text: Great price, the ball is soft, great pump. The metal did bend already but I put a heavy duty steak in there to straighten it out and is holding up. Thanks for a great deal =).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages, even the baby.
customer_reviews.text: I never knew it would be such a hit and I wish I had bought one a long time ago.Family fun for the whole family. My rope has stretched so that the ball almost reaches the ground which is great for the baby to be able to reach. As an adult, I simply step back and play as normal. The pole has remained sturdy without shaking. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: a girl is not no one

customer_reviews.title: We returned the product.
customer_reviews.text: It comes in 3 parts... obviously, but they are not fit very well, but more specifically, we expected to be able to "stab" it in the ground to take to the park, etc... this is a 3 part pole that requires a permanent install... but is not very sturdy for that requirement. If I'm putting concrete in... I'm gonna want a solid pole, not a sort of wobbly one. If they ever decide to make the bottom 3rd into a stab-it-into-grass pointed section to use as a transportable tetherball set... WE WILL BE ALL IN. We were all pretty bummed. We have a Boston Terrier and wanted a fun park activity...
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package had been opened
customer_reviews.text: The product was later in arriving than stated; the package had obviously been opened. There were two pins included to inflate the tetherball itself. Both were bent. Fortunately we had one for other equipment and were able to use that. The tetherball requires a tighter sleeve for satisfactory installation. If you use the sleeve supplied, the pole will wobble too much, cannot be used. Even worse, the size of the pole means you need a custom order sleeve to fit the pole tightly enough to use it. In all, too many problems with this equipment. It should be easy enough for the manufacturer to supply a sleeve of the correct dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: NKC

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this in the backyard but...
customer_reviews.text: There is some room in the sleeve and the whole poles moves slightly when using it. Nothing huge but my daughter pointed out that the tether ball pole at the school does not move. This has 2 pieces and a sleeve to slide it in. I cemented it into the ground in the back yard. Still a lot of fun but wish I had the option of buying it as one solid pole that is cemented directly into the ground. I did not find that on Amazon... probably way to long to ship.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Sukie Loves Tether Ball
customer_reviews.text: Got this to drain some of the energy out of our little Boston Terrier Sukie. She loves it and goes out several times a day to play for a half hour or so. This is a quality set and has lasted for a few months now , the other sets I bought only lasted a couple of days before she had the ball flattened or the pole bent. good deal especially if you are just going to have kids playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Sims

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this product
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this product, easy to assemble. I put the pole in a 5 gallon bucket filled with concrete and then I buried the bucket. Now I can move it if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: item came on time but ball had a defective valve ...
customer_reviews.text: item came on time but ball had a defective valve had to buy another ball which was easier than returning everything and waiting to reorder that is the only hassle you cant just go back to a store Prob wont order again new ball came from another vendor no problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for some backyard games. Worked great and lots of fun. Only negative is the plastic sleeve is fairly useless for installation. Ended up setting the pole in concrete using an old tire as a base so it wouldn't come out of the ground while playing and could be easily moved.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Beck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids 10 and under
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy pole and quality ball and rope. The only negative is that because the pole comes in 2 pieces, it is a little wobbly at the top because of the connection between the 2 poles not being 100% tight. But still good for kids 10 and under I would say. The poles are good quality metal.
customer_reviews.author: Vetea Ribet

customer_reviews.title: Beware- Check the quality/ seriously
customer_reviews.text: I was excited but come on the string to ball looks to be hanging by 1/2 the original cord. Really quality control just doesn’t exist with this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vala

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were going to make a tetherball set from scratch and we'd already priced out the supplies when I found this. It cost 50 - 75% less than making one from scratch and was SO MUCH easier that it was a no brainer. The pole does wobble a little which I read in other reviews, but my kids don't mind. It's been a draw while we've been quarantined!
customer_reviews.author: C. Garrard

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, ball broke within an hour
customer_reviews.text: We bought concrete and installed the pole, was easy. Kids began playing the next day and within an hour or so, the ball broke off from the rope, and we cannot reattach it as the loop on the ball is completely gone. Very disappointed as we purchased this for use at a grad party and it didn’t even last 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Bends easily!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and the very first day we had the it up, the pole bent. We were not hanging on it or anything, just playing tetherball and the pole (that was set in concrete) bent over. I ordered another one, thinking maybe it was just a fluke, and the second one bent within 30 minutes of playing. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Keonicub

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This company is wonderful. We had the set up for 3 days and the ball connection to the string has a manufacturer's defect. I call Park & Sun, immediately a real person answers the phone, I was transferred to the owner Ron. I sent Ron a couple of pictures of the ball he was very concerned that we had issues with the set. He immediately mailed out a new ball along with a return label for the old ball so he can address the issue with his manufacture. Great American family-owned company. I will definitely recommend this company. 5-star service.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great set, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughters wedding day, they wanted numerous games to have for guests and this was something we played quite often as kids. Great set, sturdy, we will hopefully enjoy years of use out of this game!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoors Game for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Love the game tetherball , we has children many many years ago played and couldn’t get enough, so today my golden retriever Addie and my sons German shepherd Diesel enjoy this play this and no chasing balls ! Great and easy setup plus a joy to play !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this and was really enjoying it with my grandchildren. Until the plastic sleeve broke. It's very thin and one time when I was removing the pole for storage it snapped and came out of the ground with it. Now it is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Citmy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in our 3-generation household loves this tetherball set! Easy to assemble, sturdy and the ground hole liner is a nice bonus, making it easy to remove and replace the pole when mowing the lawn. Prompt delivery too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: la critique

customer_reviews.title: Happy w/ Purchase But Strongly Suggest 2 section pole versus 3
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Easy to put together but I should have spent a few more dollars & bought the 2 piece versus 3 piece one. It's a tad wobbly & am sure that having it in less pieces would take care of that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a week
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids ad my daycare children to play with when they were outside. I put it in the ground with concrete and the kids barely got to play with it and withing 4 days the pols bent and ended up completely breaking. I would not recommend this product! In my opinion you're better off purchasing just the tether ball from a walmart and a steel pole from a lowes or home depot, drilling a couple holes in it and mounting it that way...which i what I did.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Defective ball
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Unfortunately the ball last more than 20 min before breaking. Firstly, it came in with cuts on the exterior of the ball but we let that slide cause it still held air. However, it was upsetting when the ring that holds the rope onto the ball shattered, rendering the ball useless. This set is much too expensive to have that happen... Pros: Setup was easy, especially using quickcrete to secure the sleeve, and we like that the pole can be removed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Dig hole, avoiding sprinkler pipes, pour in concrete mix, add water, set pole holder and make sure it is level. Come back in 12 hours and put the rest together. Beat your kids in tetherball whole they are still shorter than you. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: Ball inflated. Was worried after reading some reviews. Did not have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: jmich

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheap, you get what you pay for. My recommendation is to spend a little more money & get one that won’t break after 3 months. When I called customer service the woman was extremely rude & told me they only have a 90 day policy. I live in Maine & couldn’t set my sons tether ball up until the snow melted & it was warm enough to pour the concrete. The company was not helpful and didn’t do anything to help. Buy from another company!
customer_reviews.author: roy l.

customer_reviews.title: It is of no use for me and looks like its return window is closed as well
customer_reviews.text: The product shows it has ball as well with it. but I just got it without the ball? It is of no use for me and looks like its return window is closed as well. I want to know how we can have a product that is nothing without the ball?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I put the poll in cement in a 5 gallon bucket then buried the 5 gallon bucket up to the rim so if I ever need to move it will be easy to do so
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: This product is not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, this item is terrible and made cheaply, the only original part we are using is the ball and string the rest I had to replace with quality stuff from the hardware store
customer_reviews.author: Just a Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fun purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like most that the poles were thick and solid, very durable and easy to put together. I used a heavy duty umbrella stand to hold it up for now and it is solid as ever. The length of the string is perfect for play. I did not like the ball it came with. As it filled with air it appeared to have a wrinkled look, but it holds the air well and the children play just fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: Super shopper

customer_reviews.title: ... wobbly and the line that connects the ball is super long, but overall for the price it is ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit wobbly and the line that connects the ball is super long, but overall for the price it is a great product. The line is an easy fix and unless you are an olympic athlete I don't feel that the wobbly aspect is a deterrent to purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: P.Gilly

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: What a nice surprise to get more than you expected! The polls are very heavy duty and the ball does have a thin soft padding around it (helpful when you get hit in the face). I do rerecord using a bag of concrete mix and the included sleeve that allows easy removal.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up. Quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Sturdiness depends on how you install it. Appears to be very sturdy and a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Tetherball for a 7 year old fanatic
customer_reviews.text: We're pleased with the Park and Sun set we got for our grandson. He's super excited about tetherball at school and is thrilled to have his own set now. The rope was long enough to lower down to his height. We mounted it in a tire and everyone is happy with the set up. It's a perfect set for a newcomer to the sport--not too expensive but a well built to withstand a 7 year old and his friends.
customer_reviews.author: CathyT

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Had one before but pole broke and ball disconnected. Bought the new one and so far it is very sturdy and we are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 yro. She has played it every single day and it has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Firewife21

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: This brought me back to my childhood. I am now playing with my grandbabies. They enjoy the whole lgamily plays
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need permanent place for it w cement install.
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! We dug a hole and installed w cement. Easy andnlight enough foe this chikd to remove pole and unclip ball for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Boo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I got it for my dog, she plays tether ball by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for the kids and the whole family lives it!
customer_reviews.author: Rojoreal

customer_reviews.title: Came with missing part
customer_reviews.text: When i recieved the package the box was torn and I didnt have to open it everything slid right out. It was missing a pole. It was also a day late.
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: No base included
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize that no base was included. Would have liked it to be a little more portable as opposed to having to install in cement. Otherwise, good product. Kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great tetherball set
customer_reviews.text: Love this pole. We leave it up year round. It comes out of the sleeve easily to mow the grass, too.
customer_reviews.author: Pico111

customer_reviews.title: was missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The set arrived without the top piece of the pole and the hardware and is unusable as is...
customer_reviews.author: l.u.

customer_reviews.title: Pole bent on first use
customer_reviews.text: Pole bent really bad after first use. Currently looking for a pole that I can use with the $50 ball I now have. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be flimsy. I figured I would soon be buying a new pole and I was okay with that. Actually, it is quite sturdy. It really exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Harold James Falcon III

customer_reviews.title: Good quality..Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Great Fun..Ball kept coming off until we tightened the screw at the top of pole..It was fine then..The kids loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Bateman

customer_reviews.title: This is junk
customer_reviews.text: The first o e I orded was missing the pump, air needle and 1' sleeve to set in concrete. I returnd it. The next unit was complete but the ball would not hold air, so iconsider this item near junk.
customer_reviews.author: Clam Cove

customer_reviews.title: Kids have a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, the ball is soft, the only thing is a little work to set it on the ground and have it to stay sturdy, other than that my daughter and her friends have a lot a fun playing!
customer_reviews.author: PAULINA ESCOTO

customer_reviews.title: It works great and there is no noticeable sway
customer_reviews.text: i was afraid that it would be too flimsy and too much sway. It works great and there is no noticeable sway. glad i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but the ground sleeve supplied for pole is to big, therefor pole is not solid and wiggles around ?!?!?
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Works good for us.
customer_reviews.text: Durable enough for our little family with little play time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just came with a pole. No ball. No string. What in the actual heck?
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it, little wobbly were the 2 pipes join, overall nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Stuck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I fully intend to order another one for our lake house in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Basha

customer_reviews.title: I also have the Park & Sun deluxe volleyball set and it is awesome. We play both game all the time and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really high quality tetherball set. I also have the Park & Sun deluxe volleyball set and it is awesome. We play both game all the time and my friends always ask me.. "Where did you find this stuff?".
customer_reviews.author: Bob and Liz

customer_reviews.title: Made very cheaply
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a birthday present for our kids. They were able to play with it maybe a week before the pole bent. It is made very poorly. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: janae gossel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Kids are loving it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent . Kids are loving it. Did install in concrete to be sure wouldnt tilt.
customer_reviews.author: hollie

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with a sleeve as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive this tetherball set. I thought, wonderful, it has a sleeve to place in ground so we could use it right away. Opened it up---NO SLEEVE. So sad. The advertisement said the sleeve was included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love it! Easy to put and and dismantle.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Ramay

customer_reviews.title: better off buying a 10 ft
customer_reviews.text: woblles at the joint....better off buying a 10 ft. 2 in ridgid conduit .
customer_reviews.author: Roque Agasid

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get all the parts
customer_reviews.text: Well it would have been great but did not receive the ground sleeve in the package so....
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: great at first but didnt even last an entire summer
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The two poles when connected arent very sturdy, and the ball keeps clipping off the eye hook at the top when playing.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Mead

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love playing with it. My only complaint is that the pole does not fit tightly enough in the sleeve, which causes it to wobble more than I like. The sleeve is set one foot in concrete, so it's not moving,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: neighborhood favorite
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her friends absolutely love this. The only complaint I have is the rope wears quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JC1972

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR KIDS AND ADULTS!
customer_reviews.text: Been a Great Summer investment for the kids. Even the adults love it also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun. We used an old tire and concrete to set it up. The kids all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. We cemented it but it still wobbles some. Even with duck taping bottom and such like directions said.
customer_reviews.author: Aleesha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and it is loved by everyone
customer_reviews.text: When my daughter opened it on Christmas morning she played it right away. Easy to set up and it is loved by everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Ball not connected to rope very well
customer_reviews.text: Ball came off the rope at the connection point on the ball after 4 hits.
customer_reviews.author: Larson 260

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Installed in cement and is sturdy and durable. Even my older nephews belt it and it holds firm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The warning on the package which was not included in the write-up about it.
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent service
customer_reviews.text: We needed a replacement part and there was no hesitation. Shipped super fast, responsive. Kids love this product and we're super excited about it!
customer_reviews.author: SHabeck

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: A great purchase for the money. My kids love it and play for hours. It's easy to install too.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tether ball. Fell apart before first use.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions on the ball. The plug immediately fell into the hole. Now it is useless. Frustrated after spending time and money to install the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Cteal

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: This broke with minimal use. Had it about six months.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loves it, she plays on it daily with a partner or not, great exercise for her, she even uses it for her softball batting practice, sounds strange but she has improved her hitting this way, got to get her another ball now,,,,,
customer_reviews.author: PrimoVargas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We play as a family and it has held up in the Arizona sun.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Travis

customer_reviews.title: ball broke off the rope within an hour of playing
customer_reviews.text: The family was so excited to play this but within an hour the ball broke off the rope. Very disappointing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: sleeve too small for pole
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. The sleeve is the same size as the pole. The pole is supposed to go into the sleeve. It does not fit. Guess i have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sal t

customer_reviews.title: more fun then expected.
customer_reviews.text: Kids got right to playing with this as soon as it was in the ground, will require concreting to keep the pole from being flimsy. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER LAWSON

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for athletic neice who is fourteen. She was very happy. My sister in law informs me it is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Borrero

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Product is fun and as expected, however, pole is not good quality. I don't think it will last long and will need a sturdier pipe down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Liston

customer_reviews.title: Qualities materials!
customer_reviews.text: The entire family is loving this product. Easy assembly and fun as an outside activity. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: fay morris

customer_reviews.title: ... who regularly uses this item it holds up just fine. Easy to assemble and a quality product
customer_reviews.text: For a family of 6 who regularly uses this item it holds up just fine. Easy to assemble and a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Shanon

customer_reviews.title: Ongoing fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous set! My neighbors got it and we decided to order it too. My boys are 8 and 11 and they really loved it. We dug a deep hole and wedged in some wood shimmies and rocks to hold it in place. It was easy. No need for cement.
customer_reviews.author: Robin W.

customer_reviews.title: Weak design that failed within 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Two games in and the ball’s weak attachment hook broke. Really poor construction. There needs to be a more durable solution or you end up with an empty pole.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe chain doesn't stay attached to pole
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase minus the clip that holds it to the chain snaps off frequently. My aunt and uncle were visiting and he hit the ball and off came the chain and the loop clip and broke her front tooth. REPLACE THE CLIPS it's unsafe!
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it! Brings back mom and dads childhood
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it but a little wobbly thinking of maybe cementing pole in ground
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy parr

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this tetherball set from Amazon for our 7 year old granddaughter's birthday. She loves playing tetherball and it looks like we may have to purchase another since the family dog loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer KatPo

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts! Could not use the product because the PVC sleeve (pipe) was missing. Air pump was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Raimar2000

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item and my great niece & nephew are enjoying it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My set came complete and the pole itself seems sturdy enough for light backyard play, but the instructions and overall anchoring design are junk. I dug a foot deep hole, 8 inches in diameter exactly per instructions. I poured a concrete footer for the sleeve to sit in and let it cure. Within half an hour of play, the force of the pole getting banged around made the concrete wobble in the ground and eventually crack. A 10+ foot pole with a swinging ball on the end needs a much bigger footer tham what they recommend to be stable. I'll be digging another hole, using a longer PVC piece, and pouring more concrete. Kids were bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Park & Sun Sports Permanent Outdoor Tetherball Set with Accessories
product_meta.description:
The Park & Sun Sports permanent outdoor tetherball set includes everything needed for a fun and competitive playing experience. Choose between the 2-piece pole set and the 3-piece pole set; with all other components exactly the same. The 2-piece pole set is designed with premium galvanized steel that measures 1-5/8" in diameter and stands 10' 3" in height. The 3-piece pole set is also designed with premium galvanized steel and measures 1-1/2" in diameter and stands 10' 6" in height. Galvanized steel not only provides exceptional stability, it's superior at withstanding harsh weather. The poles also resist rusting, so you can enjoy the game for years to come. Each tetherball set includes a 12" in-ground pole sleeve, a heavy-duty nylon cord that measures 7' in length and 6 mm in diameter, and a compact hand pump with 2 inflation needles. Also included is a regulation sized, machine-stitched Soft Touch tetherball that features a nylon-wound bladder, an inset valve stem and an internal steel swivel hook attachment which secures the ball to the cord. The soft and durable synthetic material of the padded tetherball cover lessens the impact to hands, wrists, and arms when hit.

AMAZON.COM
Add a little piece of the playground to your backyard with the Park & Sun TP-158 Deluxe Power Pole tetherball set. The TP-158 is tough and sturdy, with a two-piece 1-5/8-inch diameter galvanized steel pole and a premium-quality nylon wound ball with an internal cord connector. The set also comes with a 12-inch ground sleeve and a ball pump.

 Key Details:

 * Two-piece 1-5/8-inch diameter steel pole 
 * Premium nylon wound ball 
 * Internal cord connector 
 * 12-inch ground sleeve 
 * Ball pump
feature_bullets: 2-piece galvanized steel poles measure 1-5/8" in diameter; Push-button pole locking system allows for quick and easy setup
Galvanized steel provides exceptional stability and resists rusting; When assembled, the tetherball set stands 10' 3" in height
Soft Touch tetherball that features a nylon-wound bladder, an inset valve stem and an internal steel swivel hook attachment which secures the ball to the cord
Durable and soft synthetic material of the padded tetherball cover lessens the impact to hands, wrists, and arms when hit
Includes a 12" in-ground pole sleeve, a heavy-duty nylon cord which measures 7' in length and 6 mm in diameter, and a compact hand pump with 2 inflation needles
